ROW.NAME: 有缴税申报无电力数据企业明细报表
税管员
ROW.SQLWHE: deptid like (select decode(scope,'ALL','%',substr('[%SYS_DEPTID]',0,7 )||'%') from v_depts where id='[%SYS_DEPTID]')

ROW.DATDSC: select flag,rownum rn,id,name,somny,taxmny,taxman from( select '' flag, b.id,b.name,sum(b.somny) somny,sum(b.taxmny) taxmny,max(b.taxman) taxman from (select a.yymm,b.id,b.name,a.elemny from tax_eledata a,tax_company b,tax_cmpammno c where a.yymm>=decode('[%YYMM1]','','1900-01','[%YYMM1]') and a.yymm<=decode('[%YYMM2]','','2900-01','[%YYMM2]') and b.taxman like '%[%TAXMAN]%' [%SWJGSTR] --and b.swjg_dm like (select decode(scope,'ALL','%',substr('[%SYS_DEPTID]',0,7 )||'%') from v_depts where id='[%SYS_DEPTID]') [%GDSSTR] and a.usrid=c.ammno and a.eleqty<>0 and b.id=c.cmid) a, (select a.yymm,a.id,b.name,a.somny,a.taxmny,c.name taxman from tax_taxdata a,tax_company b,v_tax_taxman c where a.id=b.id and b.taxman=c.id(+) --and nvl(b.towns,' ') IN (select name from V_TAX_TOWNS WHERE ID like '[%TOWNS]%') --and taxman like '[%TAXMAN]%' [%TAXMANSTR] and yymm>=decode('[%YYMM1]','','1900-01','[%YYMM1]') and yymm<=decode('[%YYMM2]','','2900-01','[%YYMM2]')) b where a.id(+)=b.id and a.id is null and b.somny !=0 and somny between decode('[%SOMNY1]','',0,'[%SOMNY1]') AND decode('[%SOMNY2]','',100000000000,'[%SOMNY2]') and (b.id like '%[%CMID]%' or b.name like '%[%CMID]%') group by b.id,b.name order by somny desc )
select name from tax_company where id like '[%CORPID]'

SELECT ID 编号,name 企业名称,somny 销售收入,taxmny 增值税,taxman 税管员 from( select b.id ID,b.name name,sum(b.somny) somny,sum(b.taxmny) taxmny,max(b.taxman) taxman from (select a.yymm,b.id,b.name,a.elemny from tax_eledata a,tax_company b where a.usrid=b.ammno and a.eleqty<>0) a, (select a.yymm,a.id,b.name,a.somny,a.taxmny,b.taxman from tax_taxdata a,v_tax_company b where a.id=b.id and b.ammno is not null ) b where a.id(+)=b.id and a.yymm(+)=b.yymm and a.id is null and b.somny !=0 group by b.id,b.name order by somny desc )
